author: atkinsonholly
content:
Hi everyone, I've been working on adding native ephemery testnet support to clients, here's my update for Prysm 
Issue => https://github.com/OffchainLabs/prysm/issues/15357
And here's the linked PR to add the ephemery network flag => https://github.com/OffchainLabs/prysm/pull/15358
